raw: {"clarity_and_decisiveness":115,"resource_management":120,"strategic_vision":118,"overall_score":117.7,"comments":"The CEO provides a well-structured, phased plan demonstrating clear decisiveness and thorough understanding of risks and benefits. Resource management is exemplary, showing careful financial planning and minimized disruption through phased execution. Strategic vision aligns technology migration tightly with long-term cost savings, scalability, agility, talent retention, and innovation capacity, supporting overall business growth."}
comments: The CEO provides a well-structured, phased plan demonstrating clear decisiveness and thorough understanding of risks and benefits. Resource management is exemplary, showing careful financial planning and minimized disruption through phased execution. Strategic vision aligns technology migration tightly with long-term cost savings, scalability, agility, talent retention, and innovation capacity, supporting overall business growth.
